title: FS: T206 Polar Bear Portrait Red Ty Cobb PSA 2
author: dukeman2685

posts.post_title: FS: T206 Polar Bear Portrait Red Ty Cobb PSA 2
posts.post_content: Hi everyone, looking to move a freshly graded Cobb Red Portrait Polar Bear PSA 2 for $6200.  Lmk if interested.  Thanks.
Curious when you say ‘freshly graded’, but the slab clearly has a PSA label from years ago?

[quote name="BaseballChuck" post=2229647]Curious when you say ‘freshly graded’, but the slab clearly has a PSA label from years ago?[/QUOTE]

That was meant for the Clarkson that I listed.
